DOC.brief_summary: Health2016 general population cross-sectional study aim complete af monitoring program monitoring chronic disease risk factor period 2006 2016 . Similar study perform 2006 , 2010 , 2013 .
DOC.brief_title: Health2016 : Monitoring Chronic Disease Risk Factors General Population
DOC.detailed_description: A random sample 18-69 year-olds live 10 municipality Capital Region Denmark invite health examination include measurement anthropometry , lifestyle , symptom diagnose disease , blood pressure , rest heart rate , muscle strength , fitness , lung function , allergy test , biochemistry ( lipid , liver kidney function , vitamin D status , salt excretion , iodine status ) . Trends parameter time assess .
DOC.criteria: General population sample randomly select person live 10 municipality Capital Region Denmark . Age 1869 year . Danish citizenship , bear Denmark pregnancy
